name: search-index
description: A network resilient, persistent full-text search library for the browser and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run generateVersionModule && npm run empty-sandbox && rm -rf ./dist/* && webpack && cp dist/search-index-$npm_package_version.js dist/search-index.js
scripts.empty-sandbox: rm -rf fii && rm -rf test/sandbox && mkdir test/sandbox
scripts.format-code: npm run prettyify && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run format-code && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-browser: npm run symlink-for-test && npm run build && cat test/sandbox/browser-tests.js | tape-run
scripts.test-node: npm run symlink-for-test && npm run empty-sandbox && tape test/src/*-test.js
scripts.toc: doctoc docs/API.md --title '# API Documentation for search-index' && doctoc docs/FAQ.md --title '# FAQ'

author: Fergus McDowall
